heading: HR00770
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE GOVERNMENT TO UNDERTAKE A FUNDING INITIATIVE WITH THE END IN VIEW OF KEEPING PROJECT NOAH OR NATIONWIDE OPERATIONAL ASSESSMENT OF HAZARDS AFLOAT IN ORDER TO CARRY ON ITS LIFE-SAVING PURPOSE
